metadata.title: CVE-2021-3735 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: ahci: deadlock issue leads to denial of service

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2022-06-09, no details on the issue

criterions.comment: qemu package in impish is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2022-06-09').
